color.Name: Overlay Color
color.Hint: Ignored if using an overlay image.

partialColor.Name: Partials Color
partialColor.Hint:
If empty, the overlay color will be used.
If not empty and using an overlay image, the partials will be colored for the GM, but not for the players.

partialOpacityPlayer.Name: Partials Opacity
partialOpacityPlayer.Hint: GM's will see a weighed opacity for the partially revealed spaces, calculated from the other opacities. This calculated value is shown on the right.

revealRadius.Name: Token Reveal Distance
revealRadius.Hint: If set, tokens on the scene owned by or friendly to players reveal a certain radius starting from the center.

gridRevealRadius.Name: Extend Revealed Distance
gridRevealRadius.Hint: If set, revealed grid spaces extend a certain amount into hidden and partially revealed spaces. Does not extend the partially revealed spaces.

Position.Name: Overlay Position
Position.Hint: Whether it should display below tiles and textures or above.

Choices.behindDrawings: Cover the map and non-overhead tiles
Choices.behindTokens: Cover the map, non-overhead tiles, and drawings
